LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: The silence of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2DA
STRING: Our pathway to the stars was closed shut.

LABEL: 0x300
STRING: The light on which we had pinned our hopes was crushed.

LABEL: 0x3A7
STRING: All that was left for us was to join our hands.

LABEL: 0x438
STRING: Mouths that had dreamed out loud.

LABEL: 0x4B1
STRING: Everything that wasn't left behind vanished into the sea.

LABEL: 0x4F7
STRING: There was no breath to breathe, no words to say, no outstretched hand to reach anyone.

LABEL: 0x545
STRING: The light that was released into the deep darkness was drowned out by it.

LABEL: 0x5DC
STRING: It was supposed to reach.

LABEL: 0x5FE
STRING: It was supposed to be delivered.

LABEL: 0x626
STRING: Everyone thought so.

LABEL: 0x64A
STRING: Everyone in here believed it.

LABEL: 0x6DE
STRING: We believed―and were overconfident.

LABEL: 0x704
STRING: We shouldn't have believed.

LABEL: 0x72C
STRING: We had clung desperately on to a single ray of hope we could see amidst this desperate situation inside the <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x7AC
STRING: 「...We were so sure, huh?」

LABEL: 0x7D7
STRING: Reiri's comment broke the silence.

LABEL: 0x8A9
STRING: Her face was dark and somber.

LABEL: 0x8CD
STRING: Her bony hands were clenched in an attempt to suppress her bitter, aimless anger.

LABEL: 0x99D
STRING: 「Oh, we were just so sure, weren't we?」

LABEL: 0x9D1
STRING: 「We jumped at the first glimmer of hope that came our way, without a doubt in our minds――」

LABEL: 0xA17
STRING: 「Like a bunch of kids who don't know anything. It's so simple it's hilarious.」

LABEL: 0xA83
STRING: 「All you can do is laugh.」

LABEL: 0xAA6
STRING: She smiled self-deprecatingly, but her expression soon returned to normal.

LABEL: 0xAF6
STRING: Even Reiri, who rarely showed her emotions, but rather cynically sneered at reality from a transcendental point of view, couldn't laugh at the reality before her.

LABEL: 0xB74
STRING: The sheer weight of it crushed her, but she didn't stop talking.

LABEL: 0xBCE
STRING: Inside the wheelhouse, where no one else could say anything, Reiri didn't run away from putting it into words.

LABEL: 0xC1E
STRING: She didn't allow us to stop and sink into regret.

LABEL: 0xCCE
STRING: 「We should have taken every precaution.」

LABEL: 0xD51
STRING: 「――We were naive.」

LABEL: 0xD73
STRING: 「Maybe there was something else we needed to do.」

LABEL: 0xDBB
STRING: 「What was missing, what went wrong... I don't know. How could we have succeeded?」

LABEL: 0xE32
STRING: Reiri was thinking.

LABEL: 0xE4E
STRING: She put glimpses of her ceaseless thoughts into words and urged us to think again in our despair.

LABEL: 0xEAA
STRING: Her hoarse voice didn't stop.

LABEL: 0xF5A
STRING: 「Or maybe everything was wrong from the start...」

LABEL: 0xFB1
STRING: 「――Reiri!」

LABEL: 0xFCF
STRING: 「...Why are you saying that?!」

LABEL: 0x1028
STRING: Touri grabbed her sister by the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: Reiri shook off her hand.

LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: However, Touri grabbed both of her shoulders again, making sure that she wouldn't escape.

LABEL: 0x10CE
STRING: I was about to step forward for a moment, wondering if I should stop her somewhat violent behavior, but Hiragino stopped me.

LABEL: 0x1132
STRING: I stayed where I was and looked at Touri's face.

LABEL: 0x1160
STRING: Her face... was steeped in sadness rather than anger.

LABEL: 0x126B
STRING: 「...It was something we all came up with together.」

LABEL: 0x12A1
STRING: 「Everyone thought and searched for it together,

LABEL: 0x12E9
STRING: and Katagiri-san found it... It was something we all did together, right?」

LABEL: 0x1339
STRING: 「...Wasn't that the best way? Why would you deny it like that?」

LABEL: 0x1393
STRING: 「We failed, but we weren't wrong, were we? Don't deny our efforts...」

LABEL: 0x13F4
STRING: Touri spoke in a feeble voice, as if trying to hold back tears.

LABEL: 0x1438
STRING: Just as she had said,

LABEL: 0x1464
STRING: "everyone" in the room was responsible.

LABEL: 0x1496
STRING: We all thought we could escape and that there was something we needed to do in order to achieve it――

LABEL: 0x14EC
STRING: We thought, and we failed.

LABEL: 0x1514
STRING: But, was a failure not a mistake?

LABEL: 0x1544
STRING: If it wasn't a mistake, where was the right answer?

LABEL: 0x1584
STRING: What if the correct answer never existed in the first place――

LABEL: 0x162E
STRING: 「――If our best plan failed, then what should we have done?」

LABEL: 0x169D
STRING: Leaving those words behind, Reiri turned on her heel.

LABEL: 0x16F2
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x170F
STRING: Touri called out to her back, but Reiri paid no mind to her, leaving the wheelhouse without stopping in her tracks.

LABEL: 0x178E
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x17AD
STRING: No one moved.

LABEL: 0x17CD
STRING: No one was able to stop Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1801
STRING: We had not yet accepted reality.

LABEL: 0x1841
STRING: We still hadn't accepted that we had failed―that we had made a mistake.

LABEL: 0x1891
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x1915
STRING: 「I'm going after her――」

LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: 「Wait.」

LABEL: 0x195E
STRING: 「...Can I go instead?」

LABEL: 0x198C
STRING: Maybe I could come to understand Reiri.

LABEL: 0x19D0
STRING: It might be conceited of me, but I wondered if Reiri would tell her true intentions if it were me.

LABEL: 0x1A2E
STRING: I thought that maybe she felt some kind of affinity toward me, the person who sank the <SHEEP III>

LABEL: 0x1AA3
STRING: and pulled the trigger that ended up killing 50 people and could only regret it.

LABEL: 0x1B4D
STRING: 「But I...」

LABEL: 0x1B7C
STRING: 「I also think Katagiri-kun is the best choice.」

LABEL: 0x1BA8
STRING: 「You're too close to her, Touri-kun, so there may be things that she has a hard time talking to you about.」

LABEL: 0x1C2E
STRING: Hiragino must have sensed something, too.

LABEL: 0x1C5E
STRING: If he was entrusting this to me, then I had no choice but to go.

LABEL: 0x1CB0
STRING: 「Rest assured.」

LABEL: 0x1CCE
STRING: 「I'll bring her back.」

LABEL: 0x1F6C
STRING: I stepped out of the wheelhouse and started looking for Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1F9A
STRING: That said, unlike last time, she wasn't running away with some kind of a goal in mind.

LABEL: 0x2055
STRING: When I went to the crew room she had slept in last night, Reiri was there sitting on the bed.

LABEL: 0x20AD
STRING: 「May I come in?」

LABEL: 0x20DE
STRING: 「...Haah.」

LABEL: 0x20F8
STRING: 「Don't act so timid. It's irritating.」

LABEL: 0x212B
STRING: 「Sorry. I'm coming in.」

LABEL: 0x21FC
STRING: Unexpectedly, Reiri seemed to have calmed down.

LABEL: 0x2260
STRING: In stark contrast to the tense atmosphere in the wheelhouse, she let out a sigh as if her shoulders had somehow lost their strength.

LABEL: 0x22D1
STRING: 「...I didn't storm out of there in a tantrum.」

LABEL: 0x233B
STRING: 「I know, okay?」

LABEL: 0x235B
STRING: 「I was the same way. I jumped at the first obvious solution that was put in front of me and didn't stop to question it.」

LABEL: 0x23B5
STRING: 「I'm not in a position to judge anyone.」

LABEL: 0x23F2
STRING: 「It's not like that――」

LABEL: 0x2480
STRING: 「...In the end, I can't get out.」

LABEL: 0x24AC
STRING: 「I failed to get out of this cage, despite all my bravado.」

LABEL: 0x2567
STRING: 「It's humiliating.」

LABEL: 0x2584
STRING: That was what she had to say.

LABEL: 0x25A8
STRING: She, who sneered at reality, outsmarted it, and fought against it with her weak body, unfazed.

LABEL: 0x25FE
STRING: I couldn't believe she was declaring her defeat so easily...

LABEL: 0x26AC
STRING: 「Unfortunately, I've already been defeated.」

LABEL: 0x2771
STRING: Reiri had been stubborn, denying and rewriting reality.

LABEL: 0x2872
STRING: She trusted no one, spoke her true feelings to no one, and even though she knew much, she hurled sarcastic words at those who sought answers.

LABEL: 0x28DA
STRING: Her attitude was the same not only toward strangers but also toward her own sister.

LABEL: 0x2920
STRING: It seemed as if she was disciplining herself not to fit into the framework of this world.

LABEL: 0x297A
STRING: Her small body, stubbornness, and uncontainable knowledge were enough to make it feel like she was challenging the whole world to a fight.

LABEL: 0x29E8
STRING: It was like looking at the world from the top of a tower, from inside walls that she had built, creating its own air of tension.

LABEL: 0x2AFE
STRING: There was no trace of that figure left.

LABEL: 0x2B2A
STRING: What was before me was Touri's sister.

LABEL: 0x2B52
STRING: No more than a high school student.

LABEL: 0x2B7A
STRING: It was as if she had given up without any regrets.

LABEL: 0x2BBE
STRING: Confidence, resolve, and desire.

LABEL: 0x2BDE
STRING: Everything that had sustained her up until now was gone.

LABEL: 0x2C28
STRING: Even the sight of her scolding us in the wheelhouse earlier felt nostalgic.

LABEL: 0x2CCE
STRING: Reiri, her eyes downcast, smiled serenely.

LABEL: 0x2D02
STRING: Just like an ordinary girl―however, not quite.

LABEL: 0x2D34
STRING: I didn't want to see that look on her face.

LABEL: 0x2D6C
STRING: Had her body always seemed this fragile and delicate, like it could break at any moment――

LABEL: 0x2E11
STRING: 「I know you're shocked, but I didn't come here to chastise or comfort you.」

LABEL: 0x2E81
STRING: 「I came to return these.」

LABEL: 0x2EA7
STRING: Then, seeing what I took out of my pocket, Reiri gave a small nod.

LABEL: 0x2F09
STRING: They were the smart glasses I had picked up from the rear section warehouse earlier.

LABEL: 0x2F4D
STRING: 「So they were yours, after all...」

LABEL: 0x2F7F
STRING: The number of people who had been there was limited. I'd guessed that they were hers, unless someone had forgotten them there before we had set sail...

LABEL: 0x3052
STRING: Reiri nodded slightly, then turned her face away without taking the glasses.

LABEL: 0x30A0
STRING: She didn't look the least bit interested in them.

LABEL: 0x30DE
STRING: 「How did you get these on the ship?」

LABEL: 0x3112
STRING: I thought back to when we boarded the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3141
STRING: All electronic devices, from general-purpose equipment like PDAs to wearable items, were confiscated at the entrance.

LABEL: 0x31AA
STRING: That was why I needed to make a counterfeit master key so I could bring it inside the ship...

LABEL: 0x320C
STRING: Of course, the smart glasses were no exception.

LABEL: 0x3242
STRING: Reiri didn't answer.

LABEL: 0x3260
STRING: 「Why did you bring them here?」

LABEL: 0x328C
STRING: She didn't answer.

LABEL: 0x32AA
STRING: This reminded me of an earlier dialogue.

LABEL: 0x32D0
STRING: Pointless questions and pointless answers.

LABEL: 0x32FA
STRING: Only the right questions could lead to the right answers――

LABEL: 0x3330
STRING: 「What... were you trying to see with these?」

LABEL: 0x33BF
STRING: She slowly straightened her rounded back and looked up.

LABEL: 0x33FD
STRING: The unusually gentle smile on Reiri's face somehow resembled her sister's.

LABEL: 0x3452
STRING: 「...The sea.」

LABEL: 0x3475
STRING: 「The sea...」

LABEL: 0x349C
STRING: 「That said, I wasn't the one who wanted to see it.」

LABEL: 0x34D4
STRING: 「It was her.」

LABEL: 0x34EC
STRING: 「She... wanted to see it.」

LABEL: 0x351B
STRING: She――

LABEL: 0x3531
STRING: The girl that Reiri had brought to this ship, taken from her cage inside ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x3577
STRING: 「Hikari...」

LABEL: 0x35FF
STRING: 「She said she wanted to view the sea.」

LABEL: 0x3629
STRING: 「And I... wanted to show it to her. You don't have to believe me or anything.」

LABEL: 0x3690
STRING: She let out a longing sigh.

LABEL: 0x36BA
STRING: Reiri had helped Hikari on board the <SHEEP III> in order to use <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x3705
STRING: Just to use her... That was what I had thought.

LABEL: 0x3741
STRING: However, I didn't feel the arrogance of being able to do something so selfish without feeling anything from the girl in front of me right now.

LABEL: 0x37B5
STRING: 「...How did she manage to get on the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x386C
STRING: 「What? It was simple.」

LABEL: 0x38EB
STRING: 「The night before, I had her hide inside a stuffed animal in the warehouse.」

LABEL: 0x3934
STRING: 「A stuffed animal... Are you talking about the macaroni penguin?」

LABEL: 0x39D8
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x39EE
STRING: 「It's just that she said she really wanted to see the departure ceremony...」

LABEL: 0x3A31
STRING: Reiri put a hand on her forehead as if recalling that moment.

LABEL: 0x3ADD
STRING: 「Honestly, she doesn't even understand half of how important she is to ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x3B4F
STRING: 「The ROMLES team, and in particular all those involved in the <SHEEP> project, were gathered for the departure ceremony.」

LABEL: 0x3BB6
STRING: 「I really didn't think she would want to see it...」

LABEL: 0x3C97
STRING: 「So I had no choice but to arrange those smart glasses as well.」

LABEL: 0x3CDB
STRING: 「With that, she could watch the ceremony from the warehouse through the camera attached to my glasses, right?」

LABEL: 0x3D4A
STRING: 「That's absurd...」

LABEL: 0x3D70
STRING: Reiri spoke swiftly.

LABEL: 0x3D8E
STRING: But... She was brought to the warehouse the day before the ship set off?

LABEL: 0x3DC2
STRING: She didn't get found out because she wore a costume?

LABEL: 0x3DF2
STRING: Reiri brought smart glasses all the way here just so she could see the scenery outside?

LABEL: 0x3E38
STRING: I found that hard to believe.

LABEL: 0x3EC1
STRING: 「...As a state-of-the-art submarine, the <SHEEP III's> security is unusually tight.」

LABEL: 0x3F18
STRING: 「Besides, wasn't she being quarantined as the carrier of <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0x3F68
STRING: 「I find your story hard to believe.」

LABEL: 0x3FA0
STRING: 「If it is true, then... it's insane.」

LABEL: 0x4058
STRING: 「You're right. It was insane.」

LABEL: 0x40A2
STRING: 「All-or-nothing... Still, I had no choice but to do it.」

LABEL: 0x413D
STRING: 「I knew that if I missed this opportunity, I would never get another chance.」

LABEL: 0x418A
STRING: ...I see.

LABEL: 0x41AE
STRING: That was the only chance she had.

LABEL: 0x41CE
STRING: The day before, under tight security, she had no choice but to get Hikari on board the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x4229
STRING: That much might not be a lie, but I had only her words to go by.

LABEL: 0x427F
STRING: I understood what she was thinking, but it didn't explain how such a feat was possible.

LABEL: 0x4349
STRING: I thought back to the observation deck before the sinking.

LABEL: 0x4433
STRING: A group of armed men had appeared there, along with an alarm.

LABEL: 0x4473
STRING: To be precise, it wasn't an armed group but a special task force of ROMLES...

LABEL: 0x44C1
STRING: Misasagi... or something like that.

LABEL: 0x44E9
STRING: He was the man leading that group which was searching for <Alice>―in other words, Hikari.

LABEL: 0x4535
STRING: Her removal from ROMLES and them losing sight of her

LABEL: 0x458F
STRING: was enough to cause that many people to be deployed.

LABEL: 0x45E5
STRING: In short, <Alice> was just that important,

LABEL: 0x461D
STRING: and Hikari was an existence that needed to be "controlled" strictly.

LABEL: 0x46DC
STRING: And, she was brought into the warehouse of this ship without anyone noticing.

LABEL: 0x4731
STRING: No matter how you thought about it, it was impossible.

LABEL: 0x4755
STRING: No one at ROMLES noticed... No.

LABEL: 0x4787
STRING: In the first place, how did Reiri get in touch with Hikari, who was being sheltered at ROMLES?

LABEL: 0x47E3
STRING: Yes, it was impossible for her to do it alone.

LABEL: 0x4819
STRING: No matter how intelligent or knowledgeable she was, there were some things that were physically impossible.

LABEL: 0x4881
STRING: ――There had to be at least one person on the inside.

LABEL: 0x4961
STRING: 「Someone helped you, didn't they?」

LABEL: 0x499E
STRING: 「That's something I promised not to talk about.」

LABEL: 0x4A25
STRING: 「――I may not look like it, but I take good care of the people I care about.」

LABEL: 0x4A72
STRING: Reiri smiled and let out a chuckle.

LABEL: 0x4A94
STRING: Indeed, our exchange sounded like something out of spy fiction.

LABEL: 0x4ADC
STRING: Her pretentious way of talking was probably just a facade.

LABEL: 0x4B0C
STRING: It sounded like she was trying to dodge the question, but she didn't deny the existence of a collaborator per se...

LABEL: 0x4B5C
STRING: But a collaborator, huh...?

LABEL: 0x4B80
STRING: 「Was it... your father, for example?」

LABEL: 0x4C18
STRING: 「My father? Ha! You think that man is on my side?」

LABEL: 0x4C61
STRING: Reiri was astounded by my question.

LABEL: 0x4C8D
STRING: Her tone was mocking, but I could sense hatred oozing from the corners of her mouth.

LABEL: 0x4D3D
STRING: 「Shinichiro Nomura doesn't... think of us as family.」

LABEL: 0x4D8B
STRING: 「He abandoned our mother because he thought she'd be a hindrance to his career and left us in an institution.」

LABEL: 0x4DD9
STRING: 「He just sends us money and pretends to be a father!」

LABEL: 0x4E05
STRING: 「To that man, I'm just a pawn―a thing to be kept alive inside a cage.」

LABEL: 0x4E61
STRING: 「There's no way he would approach me except with the intention of using me.」

LABEL: 0x4EB7
STRING: 「Me collaborating with him? That's impossible!」

LABEL: 0x4F4E
STRING: 「...I got a little heated there.」

LABEL: 0x4F7B
STRING: Not just a little.

LABEL: 0x4F9D
STRING: Reiri lashed out in anger so wildly that it was hard to believe that she was talking about her own parent.

LABEL: 0x4FE9
STRING: I hadn't expected her to hold such a grudge against one of her few relatives.

LABEL: 0x504D
STRING: 「Sorry for asking such a strange question...」

LABEL: 0x50E7
STRING: 「Don't ever mention that man again―it's repulsive.」

LABEL: 0x512A
STRING: After spitting it out, Reiri let out a deep sigh.

LABEL: 0x51D2
STRING: 「Ah, a collaborator, right...」

LABEL: 0x51F8
STRING: 「Sorry. I can't say anything more about them.」

LABEL: 0x5232
STRING: 「But... yes. It's already over.」

LABEL: 0x52C1
STRING: 「If you have any other questions, you should ask them now.」

LABEL: 0x531E
STRING: 「...Why did you bring Hikari to the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x5361
STRING: 「I won't deny that it was to show her the sea, but you must have had a more important purpose, too.」

LABEL: 0x53C1
STRING: 「You said something about "breaking out of a cage."」

LABEL: 0x53FF
STRING: 「How would taking Hikari to the deep sea help with breaking out of this "cage?"」

LABEL: 0x5453
STRING: What was Reiri really trying to do?

LABEL: 0x5489
STRING: The realization of a bio-computer, and the use of <COOS> to call up celestial information, information beyond human knowledge.

LABEL: 0x54F1
STRING: I get that <Alice> was needed for that purpose.

LABEL: 0x5531
STRING: But, what was her goal?

LABEL: 0x5559
STRING: I got that she needed <Alice> to extract information from <COOS>,

LABEL: 0x55A9
STRING: but why was it necessary to do so?

LABEL: 0x55F1
STRING: That was just another means to an end.

LABEL: 0x5619
STRING: What was Reiri ultimately trying to accomplish?

LABEL: 0x5653
STRING: In response to my unreserved question, Reiri slowly opened her mouth a couple of times like she was biting down on something.

LABEL: 0x56B9
STRING: 「I... I wanted to know.」

LABEL: 0x5746
STRING: 「I thought that if I did, I'd be freed from this crippling situation.」

LABEL: 0x5797
STRING: She wanted to know... Know what?

LABEL: 0x57C3
STRING: And what did she mean by "being freed?"

LABEL: 0x57ED
STRING: Questions rose up inside my head.

LABEL: 0x5811
STRING: Reiri continued before I had the chance to voice them.

LABEL: 0x58B3
STRING: 「You majored in information science, right?」

LABEL: 0x58E3
STRING: 「Then you know a lot about Alan Turing, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x592E
STRING: 「...He deciphered the Enigma, the most powerful cryptograph in the German army.」

LABEL: 0x5978
STRING: 「He was a hero who took on overwhelming military might with nothing but his wisdom and saved many lives.」

LABEL: 0x5A34
STRING: 「"The pen is mightier than the sword"―a wonderful episode.」

LABEL: 0x5A74
STRING: 「But that's not all. His achievements were diverse.」

LABEL: 0x5AB8
STRING: 「There's the research of Turing Patterns that appear on the surface of living beings.」

LABEL: 0x5AFE
STRING: 「The Turing Test, born from the question of whether machines and humans can be distinguished.」

LABEL: 0x5B5D
STRING: Each and every one of them has had a great impact on future generations.

LABEL: 0x5BA1
STRING: A true genius―it was no exaggeration to say that he had changed the world through his knowledge and wisdom.

LABEL: 0x5BF1
STRING: But why did Reiri bring him up?

LABEL: 0x5C96
STRING: 「A great many accomplishments...」

LABEL: 0x5CBE
STRING: 「Among his accomplishments, one that deserves special mention is the Turing machine.」

LABEL: 0x5D1B
STRING: Turing machine.

LABEL: 0x5D3F
STRING: The origin of modern computers.

LABEL: 0x5D98
STRING: 「He created the simplest concept of a computer with memory.」

LABEL: 0x5DE0
STRING: 「Still, Turing's genius did not end there.」

LABEL: 0x5E34
STRING: 「He came up with what is known as the "universal" Turing machine.」

LABEL: 0x5E80
STRING: 「It can theoretically simulate all kinds of Turing machines.」

LABEL: 0x5ED6
STRING: 「In other words, it can solve any problem.」

LABEL: 0x5F08
STRING: 「Yes, that's what people thought.」

LABEL: 0x5F33
STRING: A universal Turing machine was like an emulator,

LABEL: 0x5F79
STRING: i.e., it read the operations of another existing emulator and ran accordingly.

LABEL: 0x5FC7
STRING: In theory, any question could be answered―or so it was thought.

LABEL: 0x600F
STRING: Yes, it was only a virtual machine.

LABEL: 0x603B
STRING: 「But that wasn't the case.」

LABEL: 0x6059
STRING: 「There are problems even the universal Turing machine can't solve.」

LABEL: 0x60AC
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x60C6
STRING: 「It's closely tied to Godel's incompleteness theorem.」

LABEL: 0x6110
STRING: 「In other words... "If a system is consistent, its consistency cannot be proven within the system."」

LABEL: 0x6177
STRING: The Turing machine, the simplest possible computing machine, could answer any complex problem as long as it took enough time.

LABEL: 0x61ED
STRING: That was what people had thought, but mathematical imperfections didn't have an answer.

LABEL: 0x62F3
STRING: 「The Turing machine is a strictly mathematical machine.」

LABEL: 0x6335
STRING: 「That machine tried to be more accurate than humans, and as a result, it has more incomplete aspects than humans.」

LABEL: 0x63EE
STRING: 「Do you understand, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x6412
STRING: 「Yes, even though the Turing machine tried to be precise and complete,

LABEL: 0x646C
STRING: in a way, it lacked what a human being should have.」

LABEL: 0x6509
STRING: 「And that's... "intuition."」

LABEL: 0x6534
STRING: A machine could arrive at an answer if it took a long process and performed the appropriate calculations.

LABEL: 0x6590
STRING: It was like going over everything with a fine-toothed comb.

LABEL: 0x65C2
STRING: It was a sure way to get to the answer, but nothing more.

LABEL: 0x6606
STRING: The Turing machine couldn't illogically approach the answer as rapidly as human beings could.

LABEL: 0x66EC
STRING: 「However, Turing thought...」

LABEL: 0x671C
STRING: 「If there's a problem that the Turing machine can't solve,

LABEL: 0x6760
STRING: and if people can give a solution to it...」

LABEL: 0x6798
STRING: 「Then, they can teach it.」

LABEL: 0x67BE
STRING: 「And if it's something even people don't understand...」

LABEL: 0x67EC
STRING: 「――They can inquire God, who has all knowledge.」

LABEL: 0x6846
STRING: 「That's the "Oracle"――an oracle machine.」

LABEL: 0x6897
STRING: Oracle――

LABEL: 0x68B1
STRING: I recalled what Reiri had said yesterday.

LABEL: 0x6938
STRING: The all-knowing God.

LABEL: 0x6956
STRING: An existence that held information humans couldn't know.

LABEL: 0x6982
STRING: Seeing the horrifyingly bright light of <COOS>, Reiri had called it the Oracle.

LABEL: 0x69D8
STRING: I could see now that it was a form of respect toward the <COOS> network, which held information no man could know.

LABEL: 0x6A46
STRING: Before I knew it, Reiri had returned to her normal self and was speaking with a theatrical expression.

LABEL: 0x6A94
STRING: Her tone was wicked yet enlightened, pedantic yet alluring.

LABEL: 0x6BC8
STRING: 「Ever since the "Fourth Day," I've lived on knowledge alone.」

LABEL: 0x6C0C
STRING: 「Knowing something that no one else does―that's power.」

LABEL: 0x6C4D
STRING: 「Rarity...」

LABEL: 0x6C78
STRING: 「Exactly. No one else knows. That rarity makes me valuable.」

LABEL: 0x6D39
STRING: 「I acted to make the most of that value. I made a deal with ROMLES, in a way.」

LABEL: 0x6D9E
STRING: Her value and how to use it to fight ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x6DF0
STRING: I wondered how long Reiri had been aware of such a thing.

LABEL: 0x6E3C
STRING: Even now, she was a high school student still in her teens.

LABEL: 0x6E70
STRING: It was like she was trying to market herself for a price at such a young age.

LABEL: 0x6EC0
STRING: That might be worthy of respect and praise, but more than that, it seemed sad.

LABEL: 0x6F84
STRING: 「You look like you want to say something, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x6FDE
STRING: 「Do you feel sorry for the poor child?」

LABEL: 0x701F
STRING: 「Don't say it like that...」

LABEL: 0x70AF
STRING: 「Yeah... Sorry. It's a habit.」

LABEL: 0x70DC
STRING: Reiri scratched the back of her head.

LABEL: 0x710E
STRING: What a bad habit.

LABEL: 0x7138
STRING: I couldn't say how poor her relationship-building skills were in relation to the amount of knowledge and wisdom she had.

LABEL: 0x71F6
STRING: 「But, you're right. I'm not sure if you feel sorry or not, but...」

LABEL: 0x7234
STRING: 「For me, who lost my mother and was taken in by an orphanage...」

LABEL: 0x7276
STRING: 「I have to protect my sister, for my sake.」

LABEL: 0x7311
STRING: 「Knowledge was the only power I had.」

LABEL: 0x7348
STRING: ...It was a line that could be filled with sadness.

LABEL: 0x7378
STRING: Nevertheless, Reiri was somewhat proud as she said it.

LABEL: 0x73BA
STRING: Pride.

LABEL: 0x73D6
STRING: She had survived and protected herself and Touri using the knowledge she possessed.

LABEL: 0x7438
STRING: The fact that she'd fought and survived, combined with the sacrifices she'd made for it, made her confident.

LABEL: 0x74AE
STRING: Her eyes burned.

LABEL: 0x74C6
STRING: But for a moment, the flames trembled slightly.

LABEL: 0x7507
STRING: 「But you know...」

LABEL: 0x7523
STRING: 「Knowledge is only replaceable.」

LABEL: 0x75AE
STRING: 「Do you get it? This contradiction?」

LABEL: 0x75D8
STRING: 「In order to make the most of your knowledge, you have to make the world aware of it.」

LABEL: 0x7628
STRING: 「But its value, its rarity, will be lost――」

LABEL: 0x766E
STRING: 「People don't see the value in things they take for granted.」

LABEL: 0x7715
STRING: 「So, I thought.」

LABEL: 0x773F
STRING: 「Is there any value in the information that is already hidden?」

LABEL: 0x77A3
STRING: 「That's why I sought out irreplaceable knowledge. Unknown knowledge that no one else could have, that was truly valuable.」

LABEL: 0x7812
STRING: Knowledge that no one yet knew, but that everyone sought.

LABEL: 0x784C
STRING: Was there such a thing in this world?

LABEL: 0x787E
STRING: It was probably some sort of discovery, an invention.

LABEL: 0x78B0
STRING: And... it would be an oracle.

LABEL: 0x7951
STRING: 「And so, I sought an oracle――」

LABEL: 0x7981
STRING: 「Using <COOS> and <Alice>, I tried to invoke God.」

LABEL: 0x79FD
STRING: 「I have a theory.」

LABEL: 0x7A8A
STRING: 「Everyone thinks of <COOS> as a magnetic bacterium.」

LABEL: 0x7ACA
STRING: 「But what if even those magnetic bacteria are controlled by <COOS>?」

LABEL: 0x7B21
STRING: She began to speak suddenly.

LABEL: 0x7B45
STRING: <COOS> was a magnetic bacterium... What she said went against what we heard yesterday.

LABEL: 0x7B8D
STRING: As magnetic bacteria, it possessed and manipulated organisms.

LABEL: 0x7BC7
STRING: However, what if that wasn't its true form...?

LABEL: 0x7C09
STRING: 「So, what is <COOS> really?」

LABEL: 0x7C47
STRING: 「If <COOS> controlling the bacteria has a main body, then――」

LABEL: 0x7CA0
STRING: 「I think it's the light.」

LABEL: 0x7D34
STRING: 「Simply, light.」

LABEL: 0x7D55
STRING: Light.

LABEL: 0x7D67
STRING: That was the true nature of <COOS>――

LABEL: 0x7D91
STRING: How could light have a will and behave as if it were alive?

LABEL: 0x7DDB
STRING: Was that even possible?

LABEL: 0x7E03
STRING: However, Reiri didn't seem to be joking.

LABEL: 0x7EF1
STRING: 「――It makes sense if it is.」

LABEL: 0x7F1F
STRING: 「Why does <COOS> shine in sync with celestial bodies?」

LABEL: 0x7F67
STRING: 「Perhaps because they're light, they're not trapped by the unidirectional nature of time.」

LABEL: 0x7FB9
STRING: 「Just like how the stars we see are always emitting the light of the past...」

LABEL: 0x7FFF
STRING: 「...<COOS> may hold information about the future inside it.」

LABEL: 0x80A4
STRING: 「Or perhaps it's a quantum entanglement with a distant light many light years away.」

LABEL: 0x8109
STRING: If <COOS> was light――

LABEL: 0x8133
STRING: Reiri seemed to be enjoying herself as she explained.

LABEL: 0x8167
STRING: She spoke eloquently like she was talking about something she was passionate about and really liked.

LABEL: 0x8223
STRING: 「――I don't know. I don't know what's actually going on.」

LABEL: 0x8265
STRING: 「There's no way to know for sure... Even if <COOS> is a network, there's no way to read it.」

LABEL: 0x82D7
STRING: 「The isn't a way... That's what I thought.」

LABEL: 0x830A
STRING: And then came <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x83AB
STRING: 「By using <Alice>, we can intervene in their network.」

LABEL: 0x83EB
STRING: 「That's the experiment I was trying to do.」

LABEL: 0x841F
STRING: 「No one in ROMLES was aware of it, most likely.」

LABEL: 0x8461
STRING: 「...And even if they were, there are a limited number of places where it's possible to do.」

LABEL: 0x84A7
STRING: 「Because, both <COOS> and <Alice> have to be present.」

LABEL: 0x84EF
STRING: 「Where else would such a place be... but on this ship?」

LABEL: 0x852C
STRING: An experiment using <Alice> to control <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x8566
STRING: The main body of <COOS> was light, which communicated information about the universe and, possibly, the future.

LABEL: 0x85C2
STRING: If we could extract that information――

LABEL: 0x85F4
STRING: It was an unbelievably grand and absurd story.

LABEL: 0x8624
STRING: However, listening to Reiri's story, I began to think that it was not so improbable.

LABEL: 0x8686
STRING: In fact, she had succeeded in controlling <COOS> by using <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x878B
STRING: 「But, how could you be so sure?」

LABEL: 0x87C3
STRING: 「Controlling <COOS> by using <Alice>――」

LABEL: 0x8873
STRING: 「Oh, that's perfectly natural.」

LABEL: 0x88A1
STRING: 「I've learned a lot about <Alice> up until now.」

LABEL: 0x8940
STRING: 「That was the compensation I received, after all...」

LABEL: 0x897D
STRING: Reiri gazed off into the distance.

LABEL: 0x899D
STRING: At that moment, I remembered what Hiragino had told me about her medicine.

LABEL: 0x89EB
STRING: A drug that prevented sleep... That could be a symptomatic treatment for <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x8A39
STRING: 「Don't tell me... You have <Alice> too?」

LABEL: 0x8AE3
STRING: 「――It would have been easier if I did.」

LABEL: 0x8B0F
STRING: 「Unfortunately.」

LABEL: 0x8B2B
STRING: 「I only offered up my body.」

LABEL: 0x8B5B
STRING: 「In exchange for some rights and time.」

LABEL: 0x8B96
STRING: She offered her body in exchange for rights and time――

LABEL: 0x8BCA
STRING: Ah, I see.

LABEL: 0x8BEA
STRING: ...A "clinical trial," was it?

LABEL: 0x8C25
STRING: 「Right, why don't I give some to you too, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x8C59
STRING: 「――With this, you don't have to sleep for six days out of the week.」

LABEL: 0x8C9D
STRING: 「It's efficient.」

LABEL: 0x8CBE
STRING: 「There's no way in hell I'm taking something like that――」

LABEL: 0x8D56
STRING: 「Kukuku, I'm just kidding.」

LABEL: 0x8D7D
STRING: You idiot...

LABEL: 0x8D95
STRING: But, staying awake for six days a week?

LABEL: 0x8DC7
STRING: How could something like that not be a burden on your body?

LABEL: 0x8E03
STRING: 「No matter how much you want to, you can't be on that kind of medication on a regular basis...」

LABEL: 0x8EAF
STRING: 「I know.」

LABEL: 0x8ECF
STRING: 「...I know.」

LABEL: 0x8F7C
STRING: 「...For that man...」

LABEL: 0x8FA2
STRING: 「I was just a means to save her.」

LABEL: 0x8FEA
STRING: 「So, I used him the same way.」

LABEL: 0x9029
STRING: Despite her strong words, she looked lonely.

LABEL: 0x9075
STRING: Only being able to have relationships where you used others and were used in turn had to be lonely.

LABEL: 0x90DF
STRING: This "man" she referred to―I didn't know who that was, but he only saw Reiri as a means to an end.

LABEL: 0x9151
STRING: Rare knowledge and a bodily offering, only as a means to save Hikari...

LABEL: 0x919F
STRING: I was reminded of the words Tokiwa had said.

LABEL: 0x91DB
STRING: "Don't use others as a means to an end――"

LABEL: 0x926E
STRING: Those words pierced through me as well.

LABEL: 0x92BA
STRING: Wasn't my plan the same?

LABEL: 0x9345
STRING: I wanted to see the sea where my sister had sank... I used many people just for that purpose.

LABEL: 0x93B5
STRING: Why did she have to lose her life?

LABEL: 0x9422
STRING: 「"I wanted to know."」

LABEL: 0x9444
STRING: 「I'm the same as you――Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x946A
STRING: 「I couldn't have made it this far by myself.」

LABEL: 0x94A7
STRING: Reiri reached out toward me, still sitting.

LABEL: 0x94DD
STRING: Her arm was long, slender, and extraordinarily pale.

LABEL: 0x9501
STRING: Her bony finger slowly pointed at my forehead.

LABEL: 0x95A3
STRING: 「All I did was create a hole in the security.」

LABEL: 0x95E0
STRING: Her thin lips formed a smile.

LABEL: 0x9611
STRING: 「Thanks to that, <Alice> was brought to the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x9654
STRING: 「This ship sank and gave me time.」

LABEL: 0x968B
STRING: And finally, a curse.

LABEL: 0x9770
STRING: 「――Thank you

LABEL: 0x978B
STRING: for sinking this ship.」

LABEL: 0x97CC
STRING: 「...Don't fuck with me.」

LABEL: 0x97EC
STRING: 「How selfish can you be... Stop it...!」

LABEL: 0x9887
STRING: The fifty dead people flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x98BF
STRING: Their bodies were still floating in the rear section.

LABEL: 0x98EB
STRING: Even if I was able to smile while averting my eyes from them for the sake of my goal, I――

LABEL: 0x9943
STRING: I couldn't be like Reiri.

LABEL: 0x99CE
STRING: Just as I was about to say that, I realized.

LABEL: 0x99F6
STRING: Reiri was hanging her head.

LABEL: 0x9A10
STRING: I couldn't make out her expression, but...

LABEL: 0x9A34
STRING: Her body was trembling slightly.

LABEL: 0x9A71
STRING: 「I never thought this would happen―that the <SHEEP III> would sink...」

LABEL: 0x9ABA
STRING: 「I didn't know anything.」

LABEL: 0x9AE6
STRING: 「...Before knowing about the distant stars,

LABEL: 0x9B12
STRING: before knowing about the far future,

LABEL: 0x9B36
STRING: I would've wanted to know about that instead...!」

LABEL: 0x9B67
STRING: Sadness and fear.

LABEL: 0x9B91
STRING: No, that wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x9BAB
STRING: This was regret.

LABEL: 0x9BCF
STRING: When she said that I was the one who had sunk the <SHEEP III>, she had no intention of looking down on me.

LABEL: 0x9C36
STRING: She had to say that to protect herself.

LABEL: 0x9C80
STRING: Yes―she was the same as me.

LABEL: 0x9D1F
STRING: Seeking knowledge, she devised a plan just for that purpose, did everything she could, and then―sank.

LABEL: 0x9DD0
STRING: No matter how smart she was, she wasn't omniscient.

LABEL: 0x9E67
STRING: No matter how skillful she was with words, she wasn't omnipotent.

LABEL: 0x9F07
STRING: She was nothing more than a foolish young girl.

LABEL: 0x9F3F
STRING: Her trembling and slender shoulders made her look even younger than she was.

LABEL: 0x9FDA
STRING: 「Reiri... I understand what you're thinking.」

LABEL: 0xA006
STRING: 「But, it's too early for regret.」

LABEL: 0xA0A0
STRING: 「You talk a lot for someone who doesn't know anything.」

LABEL: 0xA0D4
STRING: 「What the hell makes you say that?」

LABEL: 0xA119
STRING: 「...To be honest, I have no basis for it.」

LABEL: 0xA13F
STRING: 「If there is a basis, it's you... Reiri.」

LABEL: 0xA1DD
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0xA1FA
STRING: Her shoulders shook, and her crying stopped.

LABEL: 0xA234
STRING: She sounded like she was making fun of me.

LABEL: 0xA26E
STRING: 「Reiri... you know a lot of things, don't you?」

LABEL: 0xA2A2
STRING: 「Far more than me...」

LABEL: 0xA2D0
STRING: 「You said that knowledge has value only when it's shared.」

LABEL: 0xA310
STRING: 「You still know something. Something that we don't.」

LABEL: 0xA34E
STRING: 「Something that might help us get out of here.」

LABEL: 0xA38C
STRING: 「That's why... Maybe that's why I'm even more convinced of the despair we're experiencing right now.」

LABEL: 0xA46F
STRING: 「But even if it doesn't work out, even if it's a waste of time to even think about it...」

LABEL: 0xA4BB
STRING: 「...Can you give us another chance?」

LABEL: 0xA525
STRING: 「We need your help.」

LABEL: 0xA545
STRING: I offered my hand to her.

LABEL: 0xA55F
STRING: Reiri raised her head and stared at my hand.

LABEL: 0xA5C0
STRING: 「It's said that three people can make a difference,

LABEL: 0xA651
STRING: but no matter how many of us there are, we'll never amount to anything.」

LABEL: 0xA744
STRING: 「There's definitely no need for me to hide my knowledge at this point.」

LABEL: 0xA792
STRING: 「Think of it as a souvenir for the afterlife... I'll tell you everything.」

LABEL: 0xA821
STRING: 「We'll see what we can do.」

LABEL: 0xA84C
STRING: With that, Reiri reached for my hand――

LABEL: 0xA8E6
STRING: ――And grabbed it.

LABEL: 0xAA71
STRING: 「Shutter chance!」

LABEL: 0xAAA7
STRING: Tokiwa rolled into the room while saying that.

LABEL: 0xAAE1
STRING: After a truly slow somersault, she held her head down and began to frolic around.

LABEL: 0xABDB
STRING: 「Ka-chik!

LABEL: 0xAC1B
STRING: Ka-chik!

LABEL: 0xAC5B
STRING: Ka-chik!!」

LABEL: 0xAC81
STRING: She pointed her imaginary camera at us as we held hands, chanting something loudly.

LABEL: 0xACD1
STRING: What the hell was she doing...? Wait, how long had she been listening?

LABEL: 0xAD13
STRING: Remembering all that I had said, I panicked a little.

LABEL: 0xAD4D
STRING: I hadn't said anything particularly embarrassing, but I had let my guard down thinking it was just the two of us.

LABEL: 0xADAA
STRING: I hope she didn't hear anything weird... And more importantly, Tokiwa...?

LABEL: 0xAED1
STRING: 「A scoop! I can't wait for the front-page article!」

LABEL: 0xAFE9
STRING: 「Freedom of the press! Goddess of liberty! Blessed Goddess!」

LABEL: 0xB028
STRING: 「Hey, cut it out――」

LABEL: 0xB0BE
STRING: 「Stop making a fuss.」

LABEL: 0xB0DB
STRING: Why was I getting yelled at, and not the boisterous and high-spirited Tokiwa...?

LABEL: 0xB17D
STRING: It was unreasonable! I turned to Reiri for answers, but she gestured behind me with her chin―to the door of the crew room.

LABEL: 0xB1D5
STRING: Looking back, there were even more people lined up there.

LABEL: 0xB2DD
STRING: 「Since when...?」

LABEL: 0xB30A
STRING: 「No, we really arrived just now.」

LABEL: 0xB412
STRING: 「Yes, we haven't heard a word of what you two said. Yes, yes.」

LABEL: 0xB482
STRING: Yukari's words sounded so suspicious that I wondered if they were suspicious at all.

LABEL: 0xB520
STRING: For some reason, Touri looked awkward.

LABEL: 0xB548
STRING: If only she could lie a little better...

LABEL: 0xB632
STRING: 「Well, to be precise, we arrived a little while ago.」

LABEL: 0xB670
STRING: 「We weren't trying to peek or anything. Don't get the wrong idea.」

LABEL: 0xB775
STRING: 「That's right. That's how it is.」

LABEL: 0xB7AB
STRING: Yukari quickly jumped on the bandwagon.

LABEL: 0xB7CD
STRING: She couldn't tell a lie to save her life, so why did she even try?

LABEL: 0xB814
STRING: 「We waited for a bit, but since you didn't come back after a while, we got worried.」

LABEL: 0xB8BF
STRING: 「You know... we couldn't be sure that either of you weren't in danger.」

LABEL: 0xB96A
STRING: 「But when we actually arrived here, the two of you were just talking...」

LABEL: 0xBA4F
STRING: 「He said we couldn't interrupt you, so we listened in a bit.」

LABEL: 0xBAFA
STRING: 「And, I have something to say.」

LABEL: 0xBB6D
STRING: Tokiwa, who seemed to have calmed down completely,

LABEL: 0xBBAF
STRING: faced Reiri, who had shaken off my hand at some point.

LABEL: 0xBBED
STRING: The two girls stared straight at each other.

LABEL: 0xBC1C
STRING: Although they differed in their principles, both of them had survived through their intelligence, knowledge, and wisdom.

LABEL: 0xBC75
STRING: Tokiwa had been harboring hostility toward Reiri over Hikari,

LABEL: 0xBCB9
STRING: but currently, she didn't seem to have the thorns that she had earlier.

LABEL: 0xBDD6
STRING: 「I've heard the gist of it.」

LABEL: 0xBE6C
STRING: 「...That's in bad taste.」

LABEL: 0xBE9B
STRING: 「I can't forgive you for hurting her.」

LABEL: 0xBED5
STRING: 「My morality won't allow it.」

LABEL: 0xBF20
STRING: Tokiwa stated resolutely.

LABEL: 0xBF4A
STRING: Reiri stared back blankly as if accepting the situation.

LABEL: 0xBF92
STRING: Tokiwa didn't reject her.

LABEL: 0xC03C
STRING: 「I can't forgive your wrongdoings. I――」

LABEL: 0xC088
STRING: 「――I want you to make up for it back on the surface.」

LABEL: 0xC0FE
STRING: 「Whatever the reason, we must return to the surface.」

LABEL: 0xC1A5
STRING: 「On that one point, we're allies.」

LABEL: 0xC1EE
STRING: 「Allies, huh...」

LABEL: 0xC269
STRING: 「What a cliche.」

LABEL: 0xC296
STRING: 「That word has a long history.」

LABEL: 0xC2BD
STRING: As everyone watched, Tokiwa slowly extended her hand toward Reiri.

LABEL: 0xC3D4
STRING: 「We need you.」

LABEL: 0xC408
STRING: 「Just as you need us.」

LABEL: 0xC44B
STRING: No matter how much she might want to, Reiri couldn't escape alone.

LABEL: 0xC48F
STRING: But if there were two or three... there was still a way left to rely on that possibility, on human intuition.

LABEL: 0xC500
STRING: 「Let's escape, Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xC52A
STRING: 「For that reason, please tell us what you know.」

LABEL: 0xC5F9
STRING: 「――Give us a clue on how to escape.」
